page.title: 12Transport (cont.2)
page.content: them off at at the Corbet Arms at 3.25pm,The people that own the bus are at Brown, Trench Motors,Thre is about a bus full of children .The Trench Motors Company is in Wellington.If the children are late the bus goes to the childrens houses to pick them up. The Railway _______________ There is a train that goes through Upton Magna but you cannot get on or off in Upton Magna because there is no station,you have to board at Shrewsbury or Wellington.The lines go from Wellington to Shrewsbury.There are two tracks so the trains can pass each other.The trains are owned by British Rail.There was a station in Upton Magna but it was demolished over nine years ago.The cottages by the railtracks were stables and the house used to be the Station Master.
